parameters.name: AppId
parameters.description: The ID of the application. You can call the ListApplication operation to query the application ID. For more information, see [ListApplication](~~149390~~).

parameters.name: ScalingBehaviour
parameters.description: The behavior of the auto scaling. See the example for the data structure.

parameters.name: ScalingRuleEnable
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the auto scaling policy. Valid values:

*   **true**: enables the auto scaling policy.
*   **false**: disables the auto scaling policy.

parameters.name: ScalingRuleName
parameters.description: The name of the auto scaling policy.

parameters.name: ScalingRuleTrigger
parameters.description: The trigger policy for the auto scaling policy. Set this parameter in the JSON format by using the ScalingRuleTriggerDTO class. For more information, see Additional description of request parameters.

parameters.name: ScalingRuleType
parameters.description:
The type of the auto scaling policy.

*   Set the value to trigger.
